actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to provide a facility for a whitewater canoe-kayak slalom course adjacent to the site of Captain Meldahl Locks and Dam, Ohio River.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to provide a facility for a whitewater canoe-kayak slalom course adjacent to the site of Captain Meldahl locks and dam, Ohio River. Authorizes an appropriation of $175,000 for such purpose.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to provide a facility for a whitewater canoe-kayak slalom course adjacent to the site of Captain Meldahl Locks and Dam, Ohio River.
